article_text:
PARIS—WPP PLC, the world’s largest advertising holding company, said Wednesday that an uptick in its North American business helped it post a sharp rise in net profit, but warned that highly volatile markets in China were a concern.

“We do well but it’s in a restricted, tepid environment,” Chief Executive Martin Sorrell said in an interview. Companies are cutting costs as they look to improve margins in a low-growth environment, he...

twitter.title: WPP Flags Threats From China
